channel.title: ELECTRIC SEMATIC
channel.description: Pathetic experience of the soul as both electric and sematic. Life as the contact point between potential difference and actual difference. --- An attempt of a self-referential spore-like ontology or knowledge-body. Must have its own neg-entropy if it actually lives, which must give a liberating energy for further actual science(s). This is the structure only, and its content will be brought forward afterwards. Works as a stepping stone, a transmutative stone. --- Slowly "obscure" sounding words must be opened. At its first stages, sadly, some over-packaging have been done.

item.title: PS, Germ Theory, Serotonin, Peat
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded:
Key to understanding PS is to understand what is "the rigidity of soul," and thus rigidity of matter. Serotonin and anti-serotonin experiences calibrate exactly with regard to this. Serotonin exactly does this rigidifying, sedimenting, coagulating effect upon the liquid crystalline structure, i.e. life. It literally coagulates one's blood. It literalizes.

Theoretical poles represented by Louis Pasteur and Antoine Bechamp before the beginning of the century, can hint us a biological route with regard to Paranoid-Schizoid position, i.e. extreme fear of bad, and elimination of complete evil, or bad, or what is poisonous to life. The modern forking of medicine naturally chooses the first pole. Medicine in its mechanical pursuit of elimination of Death does this by ignoring all the liquid "cleaning" processes of organism.

Organism is self cleaning, if somehow contaminated, it can clean itself just by living its energical life. Obsession with hygiene and sterilization, stalls exactly this energical process. Obsession of modular body parts comes after this. Hence, modern medicine. Along with organic body, every germ becomes solidified too, becomes monomorphic---contrast it with Terrainian pleomorphism and exosome theory. Only with monomorphic theory, we can evade completely from what is poisonous to body, what we call germ. Vaccines are designed exactly for this. A monomorphic ad hoc antitode, pharmakon, to a monomorphic life-threat. On the contrary, if no structure is rigid, either that of organic body or that of the germ, idea of vaccine becomes superfluous.

Paranoid-schizoid attitude, extreme distancing to bad object, tries to play "the floor is lava." If germs, i.e. what signals Death, is everywhere, then, organism must escape infinitely, by hibernating and closing completely. Isolation of inside from outside. Including non-perception and non-acting---these are the primary input and output of an organism. Perceive, act. If input and output can be eliminated, threat of Death becomes meaningless. Paranoid-Schizoid in its last shenanigan, tries to evade Perceiving and Acting. "Becoming insensitive."

Hence complete fear regarding germs, toxicity, thus Death, itself comes with the degeneration of Life impulse. Hence, the infantile hell and agony for the new born. This may be the most distant thing from the structure-giving experience of a new born. Schizoid in its schizoid agony, is not Living, it somehow spoiled even just before it has "high metabolism." For the new born experience may be mildly fracturing, when the high energy comes, i.e. mother comes, baby mind can easily strip the schizoid injury from its present moment off, continuing its research into energetics and language, i.e. learning. But, adult baby, infantilism, could not easily does this, due to necessary catabolism of after-adolescence. Thus, baby is not schizoid, the schizoid resiudal hell of an infant can be reached excessively only in adult life. Adult infantile, mostly after its twenties, falls into and somehow loses its way, in its childhood Hell. This is the recipe, dynamics, of Paranoid-Schizoid position. Remember, most schizophrenia starts in twenties, due to the necessary hypothyroidism coming with degeneration. Similarly, mild schizophrenias, which now called Personality Disorders, also are gained their last forms around the same age.

Psyhcology and biology are interdependent in the dynamic of Paranoid-Schizoid position, as long as energy and atructure are interdependent. Biology, and biological science, must be interdependent in the same sense. Science-making is also and necessarily prone to Paranoid-Schizoid positionings, fruitfuls startings, falling short, and eventually becoming confined into its infantile hell-like states.

Pleomorphic theory, evades the Paranoid-Schizoid organic problem, by, embracing terrain. Being sick and transmission of sickness is input and output signallings of highly organized animals. Organisms throw and catch their exosomes to one another. As the inter-individual signallings of Life and Death states. Mono-cellular packages can directly form from multicellular organisms. Cellular and Multicellular-Tissue level life is interdependent and continuosly inter-forming and inter-meshing. Exosomes signal new sickness and hence anti-sickness signals. PS threat is evaded through the Death state of the particular threat to particular Life state. PS comes its anti-PS. In order to achieve new Life, you have pass its Death-threshold. This is Vonderplanitzian rites of passage: passing of the threshold of detoxification. If you still live after the Death test. A radical view to organism, may be true with a quite global look into biological re-genetics of given states. But, exactly because of this given states, it is ad hoc. It does not state how individual and local organism can achieve its new, more energetic forms. Detoxification is from inside to outside: From the guts through the organism. Guts -> Blood -> lymphatic system. https://raypeatforum.com/community/threads/endotoxin-and-fat-consumption.11402/ Chylomicron quality is due to fat quality. Fat regulates anti-PS power of the organism. The resulting diet is Raw Primal. Every endotoxemia can be cleansed through inside out lymphatic movement. You sweat off your Death, if it ends.

Ray Peat's anti-endotoxic stance, exactly aims the Paranoid-Schizoid problem at its guts. But it does not try to transcend PS through Anti-PS. Rather, it gives the genetics of any PS. It starts from the before, tohu-va-bohu, of a PS state. Detoxification is not homogeneously inside from outside. Rather, it is through the purging of the inside, or the constipation. If the innards of the organism is "toxic," i.e. filled with the byproducts, poo-poo of other cellular Life, poison, tocisity; then the organism try to eliminate all the poo-poo, toxicity, fecal matter, excretion starting from its outside. Inside toxicity is displaced towards outside. This is the fracturing of the organism, hence seperates its Psychology from its Biology. This is the exact dynamic of what happens in a Paranoid-Schizoid motion.

Probably, thirsting to eliminate all matter from the existence. But forgets that all cleanliness comes from the inside, both for spiritual inside, and for somatic inside: gut. Homogenized terrain ad hoc science and nutrition, in turn, negates the cleanliness, it can try every toxicity, if it lives, it lives. In one sense, PS and Anti-PS creates each other, they are determined from their negation. Both Ortodox Germ Theory and Terrain Theory fails to give the energetics of what eventually ends up as PS.

But the genetics of PS, what happens before PS, really explains:

Peat is germ theory par excellence, not outwardly, but inwardly. By sending the theory its energical endpoints, it becomes clear that, organism must purge its innards into outside world. Somehow, it must externalize, and internalize. It must converse its relation with outside, by its "own" externalization processes. If not, it becomes anti-germ. It must have the peristalsis. All cleanliness comes topologically. Grounding and detoxification starts by purgeing. Peristatlsis regulates PS, it regulates Death, from innards of organism to downwards, to ground. Further, quality of oxidation and stability of it, Respiration=Pneuma, is the Life force, from the upwards, to chest. Respiration is before PS. Inner-toxicity creates it. Peristalsis is of downward, Oxidation is of upward energical processes. Of Death and Life.

Resulting diet is rich in electron adsorbers, Lewis acids, quinones, stabile fats; and poor in anti-peristalsis, rancid-unsaturated fats. Upward and downward dynamism. If downward stalls, liquid circulation coagulates, hence respiration becomes externally controlled. Hence:

Peat's stance toward the external controlling of the organism, as the problematic PS of the human world.

Does this create a PS? Exactly. This is whay we are all here, forming a new sect, which is a peculiar anti-sect. This is determined serotonergically, if any one of us does not have any amount of serotonin, probably we would not be pulled to each other, in a digital system, from our computers, forming an anti-digital stance.

But, the degrees of serotonin cascades must be differentiated from each. One is less, other is more. And calibrating the exact feeling of what a serotonin cascade is is the exact antidote to PS, which is brough by Peat, only by Peat, in known history.

item.title: Crux Point of Experience
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded:
add: ether as the structure, fabric of god-head, and a primary feedback relation between them as the main relation of energy and structure: result is Growth as growing, existing universe having more neg-entropy, as the transmutation of the present-infinite-god. sends us into the question of what is beyond experience. firstly makes us delve what is within experience, and what veils the experience. A monistic, holistic attempt, using the concepts potential and actual, in order to explain matter and soul. By not dualizing them. Starting from differentiality, and a touching point between potential and actual. As three difference. and in-between actualization, two ways. Residue potentialities and actualities, ways of sameness.

Monistic and dualistic worldviews all collide at the same point. What is it the most fundamental aspect of our experience? And from where we can arrive? The twofoldness of question, immediacy, and what conditions this immediacy. The attitude of separating experience from its conditions is highly degenerated to the point of philosophers no longer experiencing, only word-exchanging; and scientists no longer studying causes, only crushing simulative-data. The word “condition,” first and foremost, dies, and loses its meaning. For any regeneration and regaining of the experience and of what is beyond, a real living ontology regarding "power," a levelling of powers, is needed. If everything is resulting from a primary energical contact, every output which we perceive as existing beings, can be thought of as the residue, and residual processes. Without a concept of life and death, and more energical and less energical, every concept and analysis falls apart. Such a schizphrenic attitude cancerously forms degenerating/misgenerating "similar but different" local sciences which have forgotten what it exactly studies at their outset: Stillbirths! This veils the crux point of experience, at which every new-born, every animal, probably even plant and mineral---matter and in a reverse way the most godlike, say, stars and planets---are present at. This is in fact the presence par excellence. Only human, diverges and diverges most, into simulative isolated local fake-environments, losing its presence, its gut feelings. This cancerous mis-generation of sciences is the last stage of civilization, over-seperation to the point that object to be studied is lost in a cancer of mind, rather, the cancerous mind studies the image of it, exactly by losing the connection of how the image is imprinted. It loses the interaction, the interface, the touching point, the surface, hence its depth. Only traces. A cancerous love makes the beloved far away from the lover in his pursuit of reaching.

~~~

Animal environment is the starting of what is called human, and it can end at human actions or human though-processes. This is what is ordinary for us. At what is striking to the eye: Mutability strikes first, and the corresponding changes of what is mutable. And some immutability form with first somewhat chaotic and then vortex-like concentric motion of eyes. "One" appears (I will not use "object," objects are far away from us in a real experience, in a real event). One seperated from the others, from its backgorund, which can form and deform further uniques. Always with a matter, always spirited. If eye seeks differences in "the one" it looks, it can find, but this is not cause the eye lose the tension of first background, onenesses can be nested in experience. Tensions can be bi-valenced, stacked, embedded. And change strikes, always. Not a change imperceptibe or unintelligible, but a change which is significant to the eye or the the mind. Something is worth attended. All experience of oneness is an experience of transmutation and of a significant transmutation. Though one is immutable and mutable at the same time in a unique tension, attention seeks the transmutative route.

What are the transmutables? Some are potentially, some others actually are; which are the products of potentialization and actualization, reducing and sublimating. Naturally, former becomes more perceptible and tangible. The latter more intelligible, invisible. Former can be used by the latter. It exactly burns the matter. Matter can be lost, if there is a process consuming it. Actual processes uses its potentials, when potentials consumed, the actual usage is finished. And the byproducts as the products of transmutation remains. The analogy and the literality of the matter is very close here. At the crux point of experience is an oxidation event, what is potential as the fuel(reductant) and what is actual as the oxidizer. Charge is from the reductant to the oxidizer. And the logical relation of necessary and sufficient conditions are to be exactly matched to fuel and the oxidizer, to potential and to actual. Heraclitean intuition must be of this reality. At the fire of being, Logos burns matter. Logos burns tangible Fire. Sungazers are somewhat right. Red light is what makes one Star-like. And Heraclit is right on that Sun's being new every day. Heart of experience is both bright, visible and non-visible, and have thrustful and stacked, embedded, Changes. Light is hard to see even if visible-Ligh is matter-like, but to the seeing eye more invisible Light is promised. At the heterogeneous joint fire of existence, Invisible-Fire burns visible-Fire. This is the Logos. This is the logic of experience, of existing. (Both arrow and a triangle. And notice triangle is used to represent signification. And the fire is of triangular, or of tetrahedron.) Mind in a sense, use hot-matter (=energy as the actualization of a potential difference, or energy as vibration) to be maintain its mind-like dynamic status. Arrow of logicality is pointed from the matter-like to mind-like. There is no tangible at the end of the arrow. And this is the crux point. What is pointed at is always more hard to see. It is more subtle (subtle matter is used for hard-to-see matter in esoteric traditions), sublimated. Life is hard to see, but to the seeing eye, more Life is promised.

"The lord whose is the oracle at Delphoi neither utters nor hides his meaning, but shows it by a sign." Heraclitus, Fragment 93

"Some dogs alertly look at the thing a person is pointing at, other dogs just sniff the pointing finger. " Ray Peat. https://raypeat.com/articles/articles/cholesterol-longevity.shtml .

"Dogs bark at every one they do not know." Heraclitus, F 97

Sematic:

"significant, indicative, serving as a sign or warning" (as of danger), 1855, from Greek sēmat-, combining form of sēma (genitive sematos) "sign" (see semantic) + -ic. Used especially in biology, in reference to "warning" colors, etc. (by 1890).
https://www.etymonline.com/word/sematic#etymonline_v_39476


Where there is matter, there is Mind-like processes or Mind. Matter itself is spiritual, exactly because of that it is the beginning of the arrow of the crux. Things transmute energy (energy as actualization of potential difference, energy as charge, or vibration) as matter(sedimentation of plasma), putting energy into concentric motion, thus gains mass(electric cause of gravity). Mind in its most general sense transmute matter, either by producing different matter, or by helding it to become discharged from elsewhere. (This transmutation occurs in all phases for living being: plasma, pneuma, liquid, and solid.) Spooky action at a distance, and mis-concept of a blackhole (and its correct understanding as torus) are quite hard Events to understand for a mechanically-disposed physicist. Sublimatory uniques using reductive uniques is close to Sema using Electricity. Sema being more Fire-like than Fire. Relation of burning, is a model for matter and mind. But, let us not think of Minds internals are more vivid than what is potential at the crux point, because both Matter and Mind close into itself after they are separated, after the fire, the sign, of being lost its eventfulness.

Thus, to be in the event, is not to emphasize their difference and duality. To be at the interface, the exact one relation of the two is important. The former and the latter is different, and exactly that "one" difference is noticed, and not the "two" before the "one difference." This "one" as the transmutative tension is the puller of the attention. To treat the problemm as the separation of matter and mind, then we lost the touch with the crux point, we will come later from the experience, the event. Event is of before the separation. Attention is always stand at the heart of emanation, of what is beyond to what is ordinarily known. And the attention is the eye-witness of such creation, and is itself to be emanated. Attention can be potentialized and actualized. This is the ultimate matter of Life and Death. But, complete potentialization of it cannot be perceived or thought, cannot be attended, as an impossiblity, it has a tension upon attention.

What attention is, is it potential or actual, apart from its potentialization or actualization? The actuality of actualization, it always actualizes where it looks at, of what is potential before. It must be actual in its extra-ordinary sense. But, all living being in a pareto fashion, passes its life in a trance-like, potentially actual way. Potential in attention is not the potentiality of attention. Potential in attention in a sense, almost everything which can be experienced. Someone curious is curious about the potentials in attention. But in so far as it actualizes its curiosity, it is of the actuality of attention, does so in actual attention. When such an exercise tires the curious, its attention becomes potential. No longer lives in the moment. As if it consumed enough potential value and its combustive process ends, hibernates and starts its residual proceses.

Moment admits spatiotemporality. Here and now, as actual. There and thence, as potential. Actual both spatiotemporally (dimensions of experience) and attentively (what is in dimensions) and locally (as the one’s differentiated from whole as background, eventful ones) encapsulates potential. Within the realm of local, uniques or "one"s (do not understand it as atomic. they are transmutables. Uniques in the sense of one differentiated from all other), those immutables, those differentiables, those flowings; which can persist in dimensions, either in one orin  another, or in both, and subject to change, locomotion, measurement, understanding, imagination, realization, description, utterance, sense; is experienced in two:

E-S interface:

  1. Electric.
  2. Sematic. 

(1) is what scientists call what is measurable through physical means. Or some other call material world. It is called reductant or fuel, above. Realm of matter in its most general sense. Oxidation and respiration inextricably linked in the Reactor, the Factory, of torus. Just as this, the formulated questions act like breathing in the mind, they are what motivates the mind to further study. For the attention to delve into circular motions around its uniques. Sema as the charge-sense-meaning depth, and the question as the receptacle for inhaling and exhaling, and the further shape, frequency, vibration of breathing. If there is no question, there would not be living being. If there is a mis-question, cutting the torus open, there would be a quickly dying living being, wasting in the process. Charge bleeding and sense bleeding is the degenerative aspects of this phase. From a pneumatic wound, spirit escapes, both electrically and sematically.

(3) GENETIC

Towards residual processes and objectification, toroidality starts to be veiled. An openness to infinitude wanes both for the looking eye and for the seen’s, as if the eye is also veiling its surface sensation, sedimented into pre-givens. Here, the depth of Life gives its place to pre-set originals and their further generations. Think of a torus starting to create a shell around itself, and a core within itself; trying to act like a sphere. It exactly seems like a sphere from the outside. Precisely because of this, a real sphere does not exist in nature, but every being takes the form of a sphere. (This shell-core creation in its literal sense occurs both in stars, planets, and in fruits, as well as all living beings.) Shell-like and chtonic is of almost the same meaning. Shelling is what makes possible any cubic residue to hold on. We are between pneuma and liquid, remembering the beginning of life as a oxidative power pneumatically shaped, found its oily membrane as its shell. First, liquidity becomes the shell for pneuma, then membranes come. Having its outermost membrane, the toroidal separates its inward and outward and can completely isolate its inner world from outside. This will bring the appearance of immunity from outside world, a godlike appearance. And if other spherelike cells are pneumatically less powerful than the one in question, then the genetical process begins. Mimetics and memetics of the generation of toroidality begins. In the sense that a toroidal can start a chainlike phenomena among others, that is, if it can be the center of a concentric wave-like motion, it self perpetuates through others. It lives in others. Until now, we have graph-like relations between toroidality, but now, this is the possibility of tree-like hierarchy. Thus, essentiality. Exactly this processes starts the organic hierarchy of bodies, electrically. Electrically, some processes are more centrifugally important in bodies. And further, in the sense of a stacked vortex movements, this relation brings substance property relation, exactly one changing motion is more pneumatically-vortically enduring than others to the point that outside eye looking at it can say that substance endures.  Or in Sema, insight and intuition have this centripetal power over what changes. Again, form and content relation emerges in this residuality phase. And the foremost, conceptuality emerges, which can be thought as macro Electric and Sematic harmonic relations between micro scale movements of uniques.

Genetics is necessary in the phases, but it is what starts the illusion. Publicity and privacy in toroidality, becomes to be distributed and decontextualized. Exactly this de-contextualization, brings the everyday dualism, externality, object-level-understanding, and most importantly, uni-valence thinking. that is to say, when transitioning from bivalence to univalence, bodies and ideas are started to be compared with regard to one given criteria; it is as if some bodiese become the paradigm for other bodies. and formality and paradigmality, originality, veils itself from within the system, shows as if from without. Transcendence emerges, comcomitantly with the shelling and oblivion of the toroidal. Bivalence which is inherent in all hot life, i.e. all directions having at least two, and actually infinite, non-zero vectoralities; and which is always in a context, started to become unfolded to its two counterparts, and one part becomes object-level, and other is lost within a shadow realm. And only one non-zero valence, started to act like the criteria. This is the start of Paranoid-Schizoid thinking: a vine has always curved motion, in a tension of multiple, at least two, non-zero directionality when growing, due to the necessary motion of the relevant star and relevant planet, of a light and of a soil; if it is under light and rooted in soil. But, if one isolates the growing vine from its light and soil; then one can inspect all its branches and root-branches under perfect univalent hierarchy; but this comes with a price, the price of losing the etheric, the vivid. All paranoid-schizoid works in a dualist fashion by seperating what is most, from more or less. This brings organicity and human realm, a possibility for filtering membranes, according to parameters: a possibility for articulation, and for boundaries to become isolated from what is bounded. Most of PS part works as a byproduct, relating that we are still in a non-solid realm, but only having to give the possbility of mimetics and genetics. genes and memes, while being distributed from one body to another, works as unchanging and comparable bodies. We are not yet in the realm of complete PS. We have still roots in soil, but, the isolatability criteria is given.

(4) ORGANIC

Between the liquid and the solid, organic body of the living resides. This is the part for the permeability and semipermeability of the cellular stages. After a form content relation and the living substantiality is formed, further articulation regarding tissue and membranes, variety of difference in intensity, brings forth liquid-liquid and liquid-solid relations within the body. Being oil-like and water-like, or polarity becomes important. For the Sema, mostly we are in the realm of logical flows between sematic, semantic components of sensible parts, we are in the grammar. Loose or strict definitions. Relations between names, definiton, essentialities, logical relations, being able to be isolated from their uttered contexts.  And working as living by themselves.

… <to be articulated>

(4) | (5). square circle and the chtonic surface.

Discretization and digitalization.

(5) MECHANIC-DIGITAL

After the discretization occurs. Realm of opinions, no form content thinking, only with a shallow univalence and hidden-governing PS. Let alone the etheric or tensive or nutritive context; genetic and organic contexts are also lost in translation. To the point that any discussion on the existence of any context itself is subjected to de-contextualization as a threat to mass or private hypnosis. That is to say, hypnoic mis and displacement of electrical power and sematic power cannot be discussed and every object must be treated as if in itself. While inf fact translation to digitality always comes with an angle of dis- and mis-placements. (This angle is an absent residue of resiualization processes. Only a forensic etherical investigation can found this, as the real error in externalization, toroidal genesis, world-within-world (or cave/simulation/"matrix") forming.) The trance-like hypnotic state (Gurdjieff, Roy Masters) of all people, either falling into public PS of their sect, or living into PS shared space of their private sects. Hypnosis governs all, in either a state of minor depression or hypomania. The former is of the casuality of the city, its occupations, professionalisms and everyday polemicism. The latter is of the manipulativity of the city or of the local cult, it is breadcrumbed by manipulative energetic-regulators veiled as saviours. Hypomanicity is opinionated by the regulators; the dosage musst be controlled in such a pharmakon forming act. By making the mass forgetful to those two: (a) Medicine in various dosages can be turned into posion. (b) medicine and nutrient is different. (c) nutritivity and regeneration is not possible, hence one must completely embrace the given medicine as absolute pharmakon. The latter hypnotics is what forms the authority, and always fuel and control the energetic vortex motion in civilized bodies in city or in private groups. This is why city needs entertainment, which is in fact entrainment and acousmatics-musics, to use a Neuro Linguistic Programming and Pythagorean or a Platonic term.

The latter hypomanics (and not minor depresiveness) is a much more violent hypnosis, and mostly called "gaslightling" or "cult formation" by the former, because it mostly destructs ego functions of the individual organism by inflating and estaticizing the ego, contary to public minor-depressive PS which is exactly designed to maintain the organic ego functions of various occupations which exist in a city simultaneously, while allowing the private world of professionals is maintained somewhat more smoothly and less rigidly. Private PS in a city is the mirror image of public PS. And must be in the city in a correct ratio--The cybernetic forcing of minor depressive forces over hypomanic forces must be called regulation of "controlled opposition," which must include intricate cybernetic intermeshing of various PS creators and skilled degeneratives whom most would call psychopaths. This dual forcing between degenerative forces veils the real war between what is etherically transmutative and chtonic representatives of absolute transmutation. Hypomanics and minor-depressives both create each other, and this exact feedback relation itself globally showing the "sickness" of the residual established body.

(Forensically, can show what went wrong in the regenerative act of establisment, establishment as a process and not residue.) (And please be careful, every regenerative can fall into such degenerative forcing battle, since every zero-point can be bled to the point of degenerative inflation and to the point of losing the etheric calibration. This is what happens to most sovereign canditates having decent insight but eventually losing their ethericity through various stressing factors throughout their publicity.)

The filters created by both act like a narrowing-filter for vision, only some objects, rigid and solid, can be seen. Possibility of new object formation, or even seeing an object's morphic structure is impossible. Depth in the surface of vision is lost. All objects and the corresponding subjects are pre-determined, sedimented, coagulated. Only think left is do commit the triggered and algorithmized centrifugal motion as the local technics, or the local drama of public and private PS. And this is why, anti-depressants, hence serotonin, always fuels the public and private establishments, by enforcing the veil over all other more-energetic phases, and by maintaining minor-depressive states preventing them being fall into complete depression and bounce back as uncontrollable manics. Mostly, minor-depressive takes the burden of ego-function for the regulators-hypomanics, both public and private. In some sense, city can only be mechanically maintained by the elbow grease and constant plumbing-maintenance of professionals-technicians; intermittenttly fueled by a manic content, in their home when their plumbing work is done. this relation is a degenerative caricature of shamans communicating with ancestors, gods, spirits. Shamans sensitive to infinitude are mostly outnumbered by hypomanics as the savior-opposition, which are regulatively veiled by hypomanics as elite, which are veiled by the forcing and imperfect motion sedimenting of all minor-depressive processes together. And system in its various doxic chambers hold in tension various discordant parts distant enough so that no global explosion as an existential threat to "estanblished-machine" can occur. This works although no all-encompassing cybernetic power existent (assuming the contrary is to fall into error of monopolizing all forces, and hence confusing power with force, and projecting forces as an absolute one frind or enemy.) This works through the tensive stability of various forcing vectors, and this is mostly veiled by PS-thinking, monopolizing friend and enemies within the all echo-chambers circles of the city-body.

Do not confuse a real transmutative and creative esotericism with an hypomania-regulating-authoritarianism. A real school is not scholastic. It is not hyperverbal, but experiential. Always works in tension and in interfacing and in touch, not in word. A real meaning and electricity, hence daimonics and ethics, of a possible esotericism must be determined here. Real power of real knowledge, always is Grown in a springs of existences and not it the mainstream, within mostly child-like thinking, and conserving what is most sensitive to outside forcings. It has fractality and embedding, forceful Decays will over-excite it hence spoil it. Child-like thinking and playing cannot be forcefully spoiled. High metabolism, which is the only metabolism which can study the minute differentials of life as Growth and Decay, must be conserved by all means, no matter what is needed. This would be in two channels: Nutritive and tensive. By regulating correct charge into correct place. Seeding correct soil with correct initial conditions. This conservation and conversation itself works with Growth and Decay, and must always be on the side of further Growth; by constantly calibrating on where the Decayed lies within or without.

… <to be articulated>

Most people are in the realm of (5), in the most degenerative part of it, working only in possession, opinionated but does not know how opinions formed from torus to the digitality. Complete loss regarding states/phases of matter and spirit, loss of elementality, and forgetfulness of the toroidal, electric and sematic, or who they really are. Falling into false-self conceptions, privately or publicly created, injected, entrained from without.

Esoteric tradition emphasizes initiation and not to give sensitive information to the non-initiated. They are both right, and wrong. Initiation is always possible and not a discrete process. In fact, childs are almost initiated, remembering, without de-toroidal wounds upsetted constantly. But, initiation is from the upset and catabolic and insensitive adult position into the next and energetic version of oneself. In that sense, initiation may be of a life thing, and have its discrete turning points, and cannot easily induced externally and uncarefully. The real knowledge by all means must be preserved in safe places. And any stepping stone, is of value, and again, must be shown to others, phase by phase. Not just at once. Both electrically and sematically,the  individual must be challenged and not be manually fed. Start from what is most rigid, since this is what veils the soul. Start from serotonin, via Peat, what is the rigidifier of Soul.

End in E-S. But, this not a real end, rather, the real life starts Here and Now, in E-S. All other is the veiling of toroidality, nutritivity, tension, and ethericity. Real life starts here, to ask the most intriguing “Why?” Why Here and Now, I am? This, along with the energetic thrusts of E-S, i.e. staying and living in Change, is hard to endure. But, if soul can stand still in the beauty and brutality of the fire of being, eye of being, the sign; if it can achieve to embed by being in the correct place, Here&Now, with a correct attitude, to encapsulate its pain, charge and sense bleeding, then, it does not delve into Death, but discovers the further Life in question. High energy, in that way, does not burn the living body, contrary to it, high energy sublimates the living body. With a pure sense, and pure heart. This is what heals, and this is what opens the possibility of new toroidality, new life. This comes in both pleasure and pain, in its new forms. And this is what exactly we call Courage, or "Daring to Truth," to use an "enlightenment" term. And in contrary, impure heart and disembedding, make one's energical body is a fuel for external sublimating processes: The body literally burns up if it does not achieve to find the way "to embed," in the correct place, when the new fire of being comes. "Wasting to the bone." This process exactly occurs both in species level de-toxification and immunization, and in public or private matters of human life. (Macro scale of such phenomena is no different than a catastrophist mega-fauna extinction with a solar flare (an extremely hot visible-fire) and/or a pole shift (sudden eccentricity of the toroidal taxis). Or than a mythical-spiritual depiction of a dimensional change.) In that option of burning of the body and of the mind, toroidality is still existent. But it is not the toroidality of Here and Now, but There and Thence. Center of Energical body and center of torus is not coinciding but only juxtaposed. So not a zero point, but a Vector-like force, de-energy, non-zero point. SO the Vector emerges. Forceful. External locus is in its motion, an imperfect motion. This is the case of not being able to be correctly present at the wake of the current E-S. In accordance to the Natural combustion, body is pierced, "spirit" flies away, to some other place. This Life becomes the matter for another distant Life. Life continues, but with fewer bodies. (Ray Peat) Fewer, exactly because of matter-pulling and matter-creating embedding is lost. Both literal Death, and metaphorical Death occurs in this way. Remember alchemical Putrefactio, or Nigredo. But, Hope is the most enacapsulating. And new toroidality always comes after a destruction, either this Now, or one of the other Now's. Re-generative law is the one above all. And the etherization of the body's liquid matter (Steiner) is the aim for further Life. Starting with anti-serotonin=anti-solidity, continuing with implosive-centripetal nutritive interventions=ethericity->plasmicity->pneumaticity: Electron acceptability=charge capacity=toroidality of body must be enhanced: through full spectrum incandescent red light, CO2, calcium, thyroid, progesterone, quinones(vitamin koagulation and menaquinones as charge acceptors of bones&tissues, cascara as the charge accepting for intestine), copper, fructose, glucose oxidation, saturated fats (Peat).

Two important things to further research into this blogs are the above paragraphs. Un-calibrated solidity act like cancerous emanation diverged from the infinite even if it comes from it. It acts like a False representation of God, so to speak with the gnostic term per se. False Ground blocks the way to what is Etheric, to what is Energical. A downward block to the what is infinite. (This is exactly why Stars have mega-flares succesfully sweeps all chtonic residuality in planets. This acts like a filter, evaluating who has etheric intelligence and hence is a candidate for next generation of organisms. Spore-like formations of knowledge can persist biggest catastrophes, this is the aim of real science. Knowledge as a meta-toroidal meta-biological structure will be finely attended in future entries.) Similarly, Attention always is fed by the etheric energy. If the etheric "acceptors" are poor materially, if attention cannot receive its "primary matter," both in its most "literal", most "etheric", and most scholastic sense; then the organism de-tunes from the infinite source. The importance of Ray Peat is vital here, anti-serotonergical substances exactly dissolves the uncalibrated residual solidity. And the pro-respiratory bio-energetic ones exactly the ones accepts the etheric energy. Latter is the Upward part. The former is the Downward. The enablings of which is experienced through the correct spins in the vortex movement of Chakras of the Toroid. The toroidal spin is corrected, from Up to Down. This two give the hope and a responsibility to us to regenerate. This responsibility is not only Nutritive but also Tensive.

This is a two-sided strategy to be sensitive, to be thoughtful, to stay growing, and to stay grounded. Exactly by studying the Pathos of Life. (Theosophist school may not be wrong when ascertaining the three faculties as Head, Hand and Heart. Here is almost the same: Sematic, Electric, Pathetic. The last seems to be related to the alignment of the two. Words and Deeds. This intricate relation of the last with the former two is to be investigated later.) Unfortunately,and fortunately, Pathos comes both in its positivity and negativity. But remember that the Positive always encapsulates the Negative. This is the principle which always arises in one guise or another at the beginnings of Philosophy, e.g. Ancient beginnings or phenomenological "Meditations," or at the re-energizings of Science, as if it is the regenerator of a sick tradition, or the suspender of natural attitude. There is a vivid "place" which all beings, even and foremost, the Falsity (or say Non-Being), is Given as encapsulated by the Truth, as "in" True. This is the tapping and the tuning into the infinite source, of what is finite. This is to be in touch with Infinite, even if the Attentive Organism itself is finite. It has an Etheric Boundary to the Unbounded, Attention, filtered Electric and Sematic, just because it is the Toroidal, being one among infinite Gods. First filamentally in the general sense, then mentally and matterly filamentally in the local senses, connected to the God above all. Always Here and Now. Present and not admitting Death. That is to say, in no way can it be destroyed by any, other than the infinite itself.

And it is important to note that, here, not just the words but to the energetics itself must point to the infinite source, in contrary to almost all philosophical scholasticism and hyperverbalism. Demonstration always is not verbal but Electric and Sematic. It is not a deduction but a discovery, and induction; an internalization of a new insight, calibrating Hand and Head, thus of Heart. (The movement is no different then the psychoanalytic Insight. the movement of discovery is not diffent than "healing.") Discovery always is about the feeling, at the interface with the infinite. It comes from experimentation and self-experimentation and not from discourse or from instruction. Both from electric experimentation and sematic experimentation, subjecting one's self to higher energies and higher meanings through literal Fire and Question. And to the intricate bi-directional causality between the two. Sometimes the Fire ignites a Question, some other times the Question ignites a Fire. (And the causality needs its own place in the future entries.) Study of truth cannot be separated by study of metabolism. A school can and must study its own metabolism and its own toroidality, then its filamentality, or else, it becomes "scholastic." And hyperverbalism or over-discretizing attitude itself is prone to two-sided error depicted above, of Upward and Downward. Unless the scientist study its own self, their organism becomes veiled from Etheric, Tensive, Nutritive, and mostly from Genetic phases, because they lose themselves and lose their Change with respect to themselves, lacking Self-Knowledge, on how the exact structure, or the exact terminology, is gained its electricity and its meaning. This is a perfect recipe for a Self-absorbed science hence non-science. Non-science can only study sedimentations of the Vortical Change as the samenesses. Non-science cannot be present at he thrustfulness of Vortex movement. It is not intelligent and powerful enough to stay in the realm of Change. Hence possiblity of a self-change, rejuvenation, is lost, there no new Event or Process in the whole, only objects and results.

Thus any initiation, if any, works backwards, from Digital, to Organic, to Genetic, only after the experience of those, to the Toroidal and to the Tensive. And it is always of vortically moved, always thrusted into re-initiation moments, always lost in the course of life, and re-gained through Upward and Downward interventions. Do not lose your spirit. Spirit can escape anytime from the de-toroidal punctures in energical body, i.e. from the wounded-inflamede body; if seemingly "awake" (but mostly hypnotic, if not psychotic) time is passed "detuned." If unfruitful catabolism is inevitable, sleep, form spores, hibernate, chant, but do not be uncontrollably exposed to uncalibrating centrifugality. Be aware of what you permit yourself to be exposed of, be aware of your E-S content regarding Here and Now, be careful where you look at, be careful what you visualize-imagine. The need for sleep and for dream, of all organisms including planets and stars, is exactly this. More on awake-dreaming or lucid-dreaming or sleep as internal control (in contrast to hypnotic entrained states which is induced by external locus of control) later in further entries.

Real Science is pathetic. But, do not underestimate the pure pleasures of Life, seeing and feeling the pure Electrics, and looking at the pure Signs, of Life. Vivid, colorful. Mostly Living is cheerful. Some other critical times, one has to bear ones own core Agony, but only the most significant Agony, not all, in order to grow. It must be "yours." In both, the embedding of vortical energy must be preserved in a tensive way, i.e. in a tension. Either through known, or unknown embeddings, known or unknown toroidalities whose center points are exactly here and now. Or else, the living in question explodes, hence become dead. Most what is called science nowadays is dead and post-apocalyptic, in an isolated way. In their isolated containers, decayed and expired: not able to study its own projections, its own objects, i.e. its own explosion.

Growth, as the most akin to Truth (Peat, citing Reich, in Generative Energy), works by regenerating and by embedding all wounds in its proximity and locality, even the Decay (Falsity or Fragmentation or Disembedding) itself.

And there is no upper limit to energize.

<vortexes toward each other>

item.title: Tension of implosive self and explosive self. Winnicott's true self and false self. Complexes.
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded: Ordinary self as fractured. Circular motion in psyche. Complexes as uni-valent filters, solidifying. Psyche and self as the fractality and embedding of various, liquid, vibratory filterings which can mutate and transmutate in the sense of phase-change. Extreme Solidities: borderline and psychotic uni-filtering of information. Inflation of soul. Vortex physics of psyche. Explosion points, system theory. Heart as cardioid curve. Tension between heart and explosive abysslike de-focal points of soul. Winnicott's shell analogy. Empty shell, empty core of object theory. Science of hysteria, as seperating the third from the sick de-toroidal second, embracing the second. Third as the explosive points in psyche. Relation of explosiveness and wound-making. Wounds in the energical body as enlargable and shrinkable, in contrast to victim dual mentality as endlessly projective and responsibility-injective. Ordinary animalic mode of wound healing and smooth distancing to the wounded while healing.

item.title: Seven layers of causality with respect to oblivion of toroidality. Mis-causal triggering automata.
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded:
Akahshic-etheric causing the tensive: god realm causing the spatio-temporal tensive realm. Electric causing Sema. Sema causing Electric.
Electric causeing. Plasma causing Pneuma. Pneuma->Liquidity. Liquid->analog solidity. Solid->Leak->Meta-solid distributable.
Sema causing Sense. Sense->Question. Question->Insight/Induction/Discovery. Insight->Deduction, Definition, Relation. Essentiality. Logics->Leak->Opinions, Representations, Images.
Parallelistic causation and Spinoza. Miscausation, as (1) between solid extended distributed bodies, as (2) between ideas, opinions, representations, images. Miscausal chains as the veiling of the real. Syncronicity as the real causality.

item.title: Faculty of Visualization, Imagination, of Willing. Relation to Serotonin. Awake dreaming in contrast to asleep nightmaring, or hypnotic states.
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded: Everyone visualizes, either knowing or unknowing. Tradition of Neville Godard, Genevieve Behrand. Internal visualization as very minimal framing of what is to be happen, and not more. The work is always made on the go, interfaced with fate. Wanting of what is though impossible, and ready for catastrophe, as the learner. --- External visualization is of the exploding serotonergical cascade, either by endotoxicity, or by irritation. Serotonin, in all dosages, induces visualization. Positive visualization is also serotonergical, but non-exploding differentially, and it is of miniscule amounts: What people call motivation. It is of visualization because it gives the trajectory for solidification processes, hence, the creative power of the toroidal. God creates only the filamentality, primary non-God as the ether. Torus, the zero-point bottleneck between the filamentalities, creates objects: Genetic power is of torus. Anti-serotonergical substances of the resetters of what is experience as solid, as objects. Hence, giving new possiblities of object generation. Serotonin, in controlled amounts, always comes. Hence, objects, solidity, always come. Peat's alchemical recipe for object transmutation: awake dreaming. Remembering the dream thought from its last point, "filaments of imagination." Relation of dreams to the galactic filamentality. Do God's dream? Closed eye visuals as the beginning of visible: rendering the invisible visible. "Thought Forms" of Besant and Leadbeater, Kandinsky, af Klint, Klee, and others. -- Contrarily: those who are not succesful at positive visualization, always de-lucidifies their dream in a tragical unfolding of the what is prophecy-like, exactly while escaping and self-fulfilling. They cannot dream, they nightmare. Anti-lucid nightmaring, as the anti-ergonomic hypnosis. Negative anima, vacuuming of life energy. Absence of positive visualizaiton. Only negative, and the negation of the negative. Its serotonergy always reacts, and re-reacts; hence, explosion of external locus of control. A tragic hypnosis and non-dreamability of mind. In contrast, a quite articulated image of happiness comes in such negative states: Serotonin cascade as "the responsible." A wastage of libidinal power, hence, fulfilled as inverted or perverted sexuality: Blocks in the internal-helix structure, chakras, of the energical body Those who cannot pull the energy downward, cannot make kundalini: A sequence of awakenings. Relation of thin poetic beam to the extensive pulling of charge of a torus. Reich. Christ with in as sacred secretion, claustrum: the cerebrospinal superfluid, etherization. Just as planets make oil, all toroidal makes oil for kundalini. Poiesis and nutritivity/pathos. Intensities and extensities of organism. Deleuze's "of the refrain." The vivid music of simply existing, and entrainment or neuro-linguistic programming as the hive-mind-ing processes, waswas. Why animals sing? Chanting. Relation between singing and logos. Logos and problematization. Problems are not spoken of, the problems are those who speaks. Dissolving the problem, and euphoric .re-problematization, as the alchemy. --- Pulsars: obstacle projecting, being enemy with its own sedimentation processes, referring "electrically stressed selective attention." Gnostic anti-materialism. In contrast, alchemical transmutation of the obstacle into a stepping stone. "Squaring the circle" as the symbol of anti-serotonergical serotonergy, anti-solid solidity. Rosicrucian cross symbol as the squaring of the circle.

item.title: Facing with Reality. Schizoid, Borderline, Anti-Schizoid escapes. Vortex genetics of trauma, gradual fragmentations of soul. Empty Core as the filter between.
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded:
Misgeneration and perversion of visualization function in post infancy ages, resulted from the excessive attention to negative visualization. Losing the ability to dream, curiously veiling itself as being prone to excessive daydreaming. Fragmentation of libidinal energy, and sucking points. Three sequential defenses of withdrawal from life in infancy. And the resulting hysterical problems in energetic body. Relation of three stages to Life and Death. Being already dead in Fear of Death. Vaknin's genetics, and problems. Provisional life, fear of living, and depth psychology. Jung, von-Franz. Vampirism with regard to dreams. Scizo and anti-schizo as a tensive contrast. developmental perspectives. Three energetic vacuum points with regard to anabolism and catabolism. waste of energy in a general perspective to civilization, public and private PS-injections. Attention vacuums and explosion points. Suppression of upward moving beam-energy in body, or the external control of it, external sublimations as politics. Re-gaining the generative/imaginative/visualization power, with regard to seperation and individuation from "prote ergo obligo." Play as the channelling of libido the Reality, enough, minimal, internal visualization, place of Love and real Anger.

Mind-blindness, or solipsism. Developmental stages starting with autism, schizoid, anti-schizoid. Empathy. Relation of it to chronic serotonin syndromes in either fetal or infantile states.

item.title: Wastage as a trickster: anti-functional somatizations as Sema to the tribe of Toroidals.
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded: Cancerous points in a body of local filamentality and their significance to that locality. Excessive rigidifation of ordinary ego functions. Degeneration and misgeneration as mirror images. Sema always points to the new toroidality. Shit-tests and double-binds, public and private. Rigidity of ethos, creates a cancerous point as anti-ethical and antithetical. Analogies to astronomic bodies: quasars, twin stars, catacylismic variable star. Role of wastage in bigger picture since energy always goes somewher, especially in explosive non-zero points. vectorality of wastage as a special Sema.

item.title: Katharsis as healing, metastasis as re-traumatization veiled as absolute health.
