item.title: Disembedding of a negentropical stack, as a sema of Thanatos, as history, relevant past. Role of Serotonin, in so far as non-local. Akashic records. Three serotonergies.
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded: Imprinting of the past and somewhat future, always admits Death. Past is more Death-like than the future. One is Decay, other as possible Growth as a Decay (negative visualization). Positive visualization of a minimal death trajectory later to be regenerated. Space imprinting as somatization. Time imprinting and identities of self-states, broken heart as a geometrical psychic phenomena. Relation of time imprinting to space imprinting. Imprinting, traces and representations relates to PS, a residue of "bivalence." Difference of history, memory and the experience of time passing. Time experience in serotonergic and anti-serotonergic states. Serotonin as the sequencing mediator per se. Inflated attention and narrow cause-effect chains, example of "pandemic:" Not being able to forget, and that PS overflows the memory, switching of self-states. A possiblity of sequencing of sequences: Death trajectories. Relation of it the Akashic or Etheric records. Reincarnation, memory as a content of spooky action at a distance. Memory as matter in Ether, infinite possible memory layers in implosive states of living, brain as a filtering device being a residue-filter (Huxley, Peat), relation to Bergson's theory. Seperation-individuation phase of infants as a local identity sedimentation. Real and false meaning of Identity, dynamic and static. Blood as fluid, as a superfluid, and in contrast as coagulated, three states of heart, geometric representations. Coagulated blood and unilayerings of memory. Unilayer and identity as given, not the Self but the self-"state." Three serotonergies: infant > child > adult > elder. Convex concave life's, Rosicrucian concept. Three individuations. Life as a bridge phenomena. A new meaning of esotericism, via Peat. Four stages of toroidality, of Life, naive concentrism, naive eccantrism, real concentrism, real eccentrism(with respect to the infinitude as one, among infinite infinities)---and the vortex relations of the four. Real meaning of education, as the Living communication between third and fourth stages, talk of the golden child and golden elder. Global serotonergy giving the possiblity to study beyond experience: sequencing of Here and Now's, Ouspenskii's study of Kant's forms of experience. Is the question "Does God dies into Toroidal?" meaningful, or E-S? How beyond-change, beyond-spatiotemporality, nonHere and nonNow, eternity, communicates with locality?

item.title: Anti-toroidal. Non implosive Vacuum in general, Psychic and Political implications. Stasiology as a (ek)central science. Vortex relations of (s, b, a-s) anti-toroidalities. What fuels the Polis?
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded: Dion Fortune. Toroidality and anti-toroidality, downsetting and upsetting. Upset and pole-shift phenomena, galactic and social catastophies as a interdependence between star, planets and satellites. Jeffrey Seinfeld. Klein bottle as the analogy. Zero point and vector, and three dimensionality, Ibn arabi. Geometry and stasiology, and the three-dimensionality as the tension between Etheric and Genetic. Currency in a most general sense. Blood as the most distributed currency: tension between copper and iron, sun-energy, world-energy, plasma and magma. Centralization versus de-centralization. Ethos and daimonics, Heraclitus. Tension between Christ spirit and Jihad spirit. Meaning of Straussian Platonic esotericism, relation of Politics and Ontology. Justice with respect to Human and God--Heraclitus. Justness. Of Definitions, of Names, of essences. Attention as Godlike, attention-vacuum vectors as the God-representations. Content of Here&Now. Currents of attention, and currency: Real essence of capital, mapped to the movements of Attention, whose potentialities and actualities. Relation of justice and genetics. Role of serotonin regulation, critical philosophies. Socrates, as a twofold figure. Paleolithic era and civilization, growth and decay. Polis and cities. Community as a toroidal having an imploded currency in tension---in contrast to flock regulated with sense-vacuum, inflation of sense and of capital. Implosive and explosive economy, relation of it to "daimonics." System theory, attraction and repulsion, relation of it to harmonics, overtones of currency.

item.title: Vortex motion as natural motion, centripetal and centrifugal. Two cones. Perfect motion, concentric, as stacking of vortices: zero point. Imperfect as non-zero point, vectorality, non-natural motion.
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded:
Vortex mathematics/physics and vectoral algebra as an analog and dijital counterparts, and the possible interfacings between them. Daimonics in contrast to demonics, Ibn Arabi. Caduceus, phase conjugation, golden ratio of Dan Winter. Implosive points and explosive points. Heart/embryso, cord to explosive point. Walter Russell, harmonics, cones and starting of mathematics. Micro natural motion and macro natural motion, nestings of helices as forward or backward, or upward or downward. Anastrophe and catastrophe, strophe in general. Analogues in Astronomy and Biology, Birkeland Currents, DNA. Filamentality and vortices, tension in general. Non-natural demonics as the external perspective of natural motion, mirror-images, projective geometry. Relation of vortex and harmonics to torus. Most general mathematics.

ibn arabi, daimonics and demonics, and four motions of being:

  1. perfect motion as zero-point embedding energy, daimonic relation with the whole.
  2. imperfect motion as non-zero-point embedding energy: centrifugal > centripetal: demonic relation through the whole. valancy of bi- and uni-valence.
  3. (at least) two imperfect motion in tension as imagination and projective visualization. this only gives the surface power for a mind.
  4. third set of imperfect motion, forcefulness of outside, is what creates the three dimensional world. third set of imperfect motion is always fed to first perfect motion. hence,

four motion makes a circle, 1 2 3 4 1 2 3 4, when looked from the perspective of meta-level teleological motion. But it itself must be curved when looked from enough broad time-frame.

with regard to resemblences, one can make a circle twice faster, 1 2 3 4 1 2 3 4, and so on. This time, non-zero is the opposite of zero-point; and imagination is the opposite of concrete 3d objects; zero-point coinciding with imagination, and, non-zero point coinciding with concrete 3d objects. And the former two is more powerful than the latter two. And the latter two are the more forceful ones. This is the tensions of four motions of being.

But if the telos is not satistifed and the spiral is fragmented, vortex motion achieves like a non-tensive and exploding quality. This is the level of anti-teleological centripetality and not in the level of zero-pointness or non-zero-pointness.

item.title: Insight as multi-layered generative thinking.
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded: Fractality, non-equational recursion of a thinking pattern, working as a seed to be unfolded in the moment of thinking. Mis-fractality as a centrifugal degenerative thinking, working as an exploding function, unstability. One-layered, univalent thinking as borderline states. Dis-embedding thinking veiled as "analytical," or rigorous. Relation of fractality with discoveries. Fractality sequentally unfolded as deductive reasoning. Multi-layeredness corresponds with multi-layerings of memory. Low frequency and high frequencies, overtonal analogy to thinking. Do one thinks thoughts or thoughts think one? Jungian perspectives, related to Story being. Psychoanalytic insight as an alignment of Logos and Pathos, pathology as mis-alignments.

item.title: Object relations of mis-toroidal. Internal vs. External. Here and There. And Pathologies.
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded:
All object relations it the deformation of toroidal structure of psyche. In its healthy state Here and There is regulated and not to be identified. Here and there is different, and dynamically can be turned into one another. Torus internalize the external. Processes it, and externalizes. The projectivity of it is through the filamental calibration of insight, unfruitful projections can be backtraced, error can be studied. Learning and playing is the state of organism. ---- Three sicknesses: (1) Schizoid as the non-interfaced externalization of the internal, exactly by missing what is external. Eye of Here, cannot touch There. "Here" deforms. Here fragments into two, vivid (imaginative) and dull (real, social). There also becomes two, as the ideal and the real. There cannot be pulled into Here, and cannot be processed in this Torus. One internal realm is to be constructed with an extreme pedanticism, and all is referenced to that internality. This is what gives the manic'ness of the schizoid. But it is quite high-maintanence. Prone to vulnerabilities, induces nihilistic enantiodromic states. Manic states comes through inside, but the threat is from outside. (2) Borderline-Psychotic as the rumination of what is internal as if it is external. Because the energetic sensitivity to what is external is started to be lost, due to flattening and disembedding of the toroidal presence. Here becomes infinitely small, as the horizon narrows. Mind explodes, introjects and real world objects are the same. Privacy is not possible, everything generated Here is given to There (This is usually veiled as "radical honesty"). What is absent has the power to change everyting in the realm of presence. Even tough the mode of presence is want to be monopolized, it is known that present and absent, Here and There is still different. Here is exploding, There, which is absent Here, is the absolute presence. At the boundary between PS and D, manic-ness can come from any direction as well as depression. Extreme suggestability. (3) Anti-schizoid-Anti-Psychotic: all external is internal, and no other internal is left. Mirror image of all toroidality, as if all torus is schizoid. Here and There is not different, there is only one type of presence: "witnessing" as the joint act of two minds. All seemingly internal is at a loss of the truth, hence must be witnessed to the real non-existence of itself, must be negated. A dejection where toroidal upset occurs. After, the truth-content existing as always a generated content of mind is injected, from Here to There, just as the borderline case, to what is external for the Other to be internalized by the Other, the movement is of one-valued centrifugality. And only the forceful dejection and injection has the value of Presence. There, before the act of wittnessing, is absent. Here, before the act, is absent as well. Here-there jointness is of the interface, and not all interfaces are PS. Some are depressive, to the non-existence, thus: Candidates of internalities must be polarized into two. Just as the schizoid toroidality fragmented into two--now, all toroidalities are fragmented into two. Depressive must be eliminated through injections, and the vicinity must be manic. All existing is "on the fly, " and no embedding is held. Cannot be held, due to one-layeredness of anti-toroidality of anti-schizoid state. But this will bring a side-effect: Since all uniques has embeddings, hence seems as an error to the anti-schizoid thinking, this erroneus by-product must be externalized as well. Since it is the anti-psychotic, psychoticizing content must be projected. This is what intensifies the polarization of the candidates. This is all for a absolute schizoid structure to be build, which cannot be vulnerable in any way, but the exact working of it always deferred to the infinite, sometimes as anti-schizoid becoming schizoid, sometimes becoming anti-schizoid.

All three admits the oneness of subjective perspective: a form of self-absorption, or of Other-blindness, or of lacking of Self-Knowlegde, with changing degrees. And all three has some determinative power over another, hence create each other. as the trickster functions of the one in question. Hence, in a population, when some increases, some others must increase as well. Moreover, in the same organism, the toroidal state can switch between these three, depending on the ana- or cata-strophe of the situation and personal history. And mostly, these states, are imprinted into the ordinary character of humans, mostly sensed as the negative quirks of peers. From the ratio's between the borderline three (ego functions are lost to the point of poverty and non-execution in external world) and the more healthy, mildly neurotical ones (ego functions are stable) one can infer the health of a community and the rigidity of a community. In the exceedings of some threshold ratios, a community might explode, literrally, and metaphorically. In contrast, I suspect and believe that in a paleolithical-tribal society, there is not much room for a non-functional mis-toroidality, since Life and Death is always in front of the primate organism. Just as there is not much mis-toroidality in animals, even in domesticated ones. Pets acts like a re-toroidalizer in a mis-toroidal household. Their animal pureness cannot be discharged, in most of the cases.

Four critical symptoms for mis-toroidality:

(1) inability to be playful in a smooth manner. to be able to start a comical sitution and end. Determine the boundary between what is serious and not both in the level of play, and in a meta-level. Inability to play comes with inability to learn in an effortless manner. Only eccentric learning is left, further rigidifying anf fragmenting the etheric-animal intelligence.

(2) regulation of agression towards the other and towards the in-group member. inability to show anger, or inability to control anger. Anger is shown both to the beloved and to the hated, as a living regulation of distance. but all three cannot regulate distance, it is all or not. this will also include ability to take away criticism, or an insult. All boils down into the inability to understand an animalic sense of locality and of territory, which only one organism can be present at.

(3) inability to conduct any cleaning. both in physical and psychical realm. if a cleaning becomes too hard, or too pedantic, or too black-and-white; it achieves a gnostical, story-like form. Cleaning always becomes more than its candle. Hence, in order to clean an area, other necessarily becomes more unclean. Wastage occurs. Or worse, the close-vicinity becomes the thrashbin. Similarly, such attitude cannot smoothly bring any negative thought or emotion or insecurity or anticipation in a relationship in the fear of losing every positive side; thus, relationship comes in two forms, all white or all black, and no grey in between. But worse: No degrees of light and dark. No feedback regarding better or worse. No cathartical emotional experience is allowed in such states, if any unclean comes up it rubs of on every clean parts, hence re-traumatizing. Catharsis is impossible, and metastasis is the principle. In contrast, an animal if enough energy is present, always self-cleans without much wastage if any.

All upper three is regarding this: Inability to work with the subtle differentiality and differing in degree in experiential life, differential, but containing heterogeneity and normativity, asymmetry regarding polarities. But is not uni-valent. And essentially linked with the three, a desire for static absolute perspective as a "non-perspective" emerges as: (This will confuse the right-hand-side of the schema of crux point, the digital-solidity, with the realm of change and what is beyond experience. The infinite, the absolute point of reference and the cause of all is incorrectly ascertained as solidity and sameness. A reversed ontology.)

(4) Feeling of "the Eye" as present mostly out of body, always looking and judging at the things done and said. This eye becomes infinitely fractured in acute psychotic experiences. But is mostly chronically present in all mis-toroidal states of organism, sometimes internalized sometimes externalized. In latter, one projects the eye into the real organisms, confusing the inner solidifed and rigid (serotonergic) reality with the dynamic and real outside, mostly creating self-fullfilling prophecies in its life. Further, in such states, organism is not sensitive of the real looks and glanings over its body (Rupert Sheldrake studies the exact phenomena in "the Sense of Being Stared At.")---since a past glance made them extremely discharged and they could not become recovered, which is a disembedding past glance which in in fact traumatized by another past glance and so on. This is exactly what ancient traditions call "Evil Eye", or "Nazar" etc, and it passes through inter-generational re-traumatizations mostly in infancy or first years in life; or sometimes in the dramatical-catacylismic points in life. The eye always look at the absolute internal realm which schizoid tries to establish. In various motions between the three mistoroidalities, "the Eye" also moves, but always tried to be maintained as "one." If not, psychosis comes, an explosion as an undecidability of the one and the infinite Eye. In order to defer psychosis, all mistoroidal hyperverbalizes always self-explaining and externally justifying the unexamined action of its toroidality, either to its introjects, non-audible, or to the external real ones, audible. It self-discharges. It wastes its own energy.

Eventually and sadly, anti-toroidal makes one anti-toroidal---usually in the guise of education, or relationship, or family. And all these four contributes to one's not being able to feel "any real territorial safety," and "peace"--all growth is in a local vivid safety. Mis-toroidal slowly losts its territory, become landless. Antichtonic unaware to its own serotonergy-Downward motion, eventually becoming anti-etherical-of the Upward. In the ever-present increases in "Fear of Breakdown," to use the term of Winnicott which correctly describes the vorticity of the phenomena. Fear of Breakdown induces and couples with its counterpart fears of other breakdowns. Fear gnawing on the hope, to the point that every corner is filled only with fear. And the global significance of such a fear cannot be studied sematically, only must be escaped in an hypnotic state. No learning can happen because this one gnawing movement cannot be "unlearned." The organism becomes a prisoner in a low-energy and dis-embedded toroidal states, which act as feedback loops wasting energy. When new energy comes, usually it induces mania, hence again thrusts the system into wastage and the further same feedback loops. If serotonergy of the organism cannot be reversed in an anti-serotonergical interventions, and the internalization of such experience; and if an anti-serotonergical state cannot be calibrated with a sense of what etherical energy and what self-soothing of a toroid exactly is, if the childlike euphoria (which always comes in an etherical or anti-serotonergical intervention) cannot be contained and controllably fed the learning and new habitual patterns.

This is the dynamics of trauma, which is lost in most of the trauma literature, where only its stasis is left, only imprintings of it as the rigidity, only its residues. Psychology and psychiatry is in its Decay states, traumatized by the external forces which are in fact the subject-matter of the exact profession. Professionals themselves are usually falling into chronical learned-helpnesses either induced externally or induced internally through their own familial trauma. Just as organism grows in its toroidality finding new forms which is of the same center zero-point; an organism can decay in its anti-toroidal states losing energy, discharged uncontrollably and drained, resulting from facing with ec-centrizing non-zero-points, the forcefulness of life which is always experienced as "external." In such a sense, external forces if it can be endured safely, always hints a possibility for a new Growth, in the presence of insight and enough etherical energical charging.

(The forceful is not a person but a force or forces, for it is or they are not one. To assume the forceful as a person is to be in a over-projective and over-protective state, hence is to be discharged into an anti-toroidal state. This is the transferential mistake of psychiatry---a healing science itself in sick health. You cannot save someone by overprotecting them as sickly frail child, or over-projecting them as a sick person. -- A force is not one, but a derived difference between two one's, admitting externality. Zero-pointness is always what primary admits oneness and implosion, hence, internality. Non-zero admitting forcefulness and two'ness, not oneness. A straight line is derived from vortex motion or from circle, as being its centrifugal derivative in one moment. And not vice-versa. A vector is not one. Rather a circular motion is one. Only with the tension of one'ness and two'ness-es, wihtin an encapsulating one'ness, can one create three dimensionals: Platonic solids, occuring and determining factor of all phases, not only in solidity. One, two, three. Exactly mapped with dimensionalities.)

Force is external. This is exactly what people mean when they are stating a draining situation or a draining person. The forcefulness is always outer-auric, not, absent, but "changes in degres" with respect to where and when the toroidal present at. Some externalities of some where's are admitting more absence than others: That is to say, some territories are draining for toroidal, or say, anti-territories. When such drainage achieves some critical states, pathology takes over (in an automata-like way, triggered externally and re-enacted every time it is called, with a different content in real world thus veiling its "loop"-like manner) and over-rigidifies the experience to the point of no growth and no decay can be studied, and organism is stuck at its learned helpnessness and hopelessness. In a negative feedback loop, with a centrifugal vortex motion, it explodes and dis-embeds some parts of the inner-toroidal-helix: Wounds the energical body and blocks the peristalsis of soul (downsetting of the toroidal, its filamental and beam-like ratio). The tragical part is that, the exact points of such dischargeing are lost, becomes as if "between the lines," which only a subtle and "a forensic" toroidal intuition can be aware of. The real causality is always veiled within the mis-causality of mild or of severe trauma.

The possibility of healing as being more than before. Positive side of trauma. Trauma as the stepping stone.

The vortex dynamics of the three anti-toroidalities is quite intricate. Look at the particle psychicist Vaknin, take the most interesting part, and apply it into a dynamical psychics. Inspect literary tensions as the vortex relation of the three.

Try to visualize the de-toroidal forms of the three pathologies. And the resulting state transitions will come up as personality disorders. Dynamics can create various particularities. Wave and frequency thinking. personality disorders as dual or triplet relations between 2-d shapes or platonic solids. The system is more basic than we thought in modern psychology. Relation of the solid-shape relations with the heart-explosion tension. Relations with Winnicot's Fear of Breakdown.

Geometrical Psychology, or the science of representation., by B.W. Betts, Louisa S Cook
https://ia903404.us.archive.org/31/items/geometricalpsych00cook/geometricalpsych00cook.pdf

item.title: Triangle, of Life and Death. Re-generation, de-generation, mis-generation.
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded: Which can be applied all phases of experientiality, as a tension between reductant and oxidant forces. Here in the tension, the external aspect of forcefulness must be construed and not zero-points. Zero-points are mostly re-generative. Stability and unstability as the residual processes: that is, two dis-embeddings, admitting stasis and ek-stasis. A theory of idolatry, and diabolicism. Story of Iblis, islamic idolatry, of soil and of fire.

item.title: Non-projective War. Defence of Locality.
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded: Decentralized resemblences. "Do not tread on me," the liberal symbolism. Evil as always external aggregated forcefulness, and not as the Enemy per se. The Evil is not one. The Evil cannot be eliminated. Forcefulness also forces one to make the Evil into a "one" and hence commit a projection. Being at real war, as the non-projective holding of tension within the forcefulness of the current state, choosing the most apt strategy for the Life of implosion and of what is most valuable, which can change with regard to locality and privacy. Schmitt's last war analogy. Stasiology as Love encapsulating all, but also the non-Love as the tension between. Boundary defence as negation of the negative: the projector boundary-defences. Auric, territorial defence as the living-animalic-trophic defence. Real war is always in layers. (1) Internal: Civil war within the toroidal, war between true self and false self. (2) Boundary-condition: Experiential tension between embedding and dis-embedding. Hence healty projection. (3) External: Gnostic war, politico-theology: as the inclusive and exclusive membrane between alchemical and what seems as alchemical, or what is transmutative or what seems last-transmutative, philosopher's stone and absolute-pharmakon, promethean-techne vs. singularity as the explosion of technics, absolute-techne. Matter of digitality as what defines being "elites." Possesions as the digital solidity. Possesive power of digital value, non-alchemization processes, "elite," or "the authority" as the possessed. Platonic counterparts as those who must govern and those who currently try to govern. Re-thinking as the tension between one and many, within the realm of experience. Enemy or evil projecting as the most unfruitful strategy of war. Trickster functions. Most apt warrior as those who can self-sense the global significance of manipulative-trickster processes, he who can look into the double-bind of the War Sign. Warrior as the outer layer of Magician. Meaninglessness of modern warfare, and most wars. "Casus belli" as the bouncings between borderline and neurotic states, as the tables turning phenomena. Who decides on the Enemy: Can "prote ergo obligo" be eliminated? Sovereign intuition, and anti-sovereign counterparts. Can serotonergy be eliminated? Degrees with respect to eliminative instinct. Outer layer cannot make sense as separate. A fractal solution for sect formations. Fractal solution to all war. Only de-escalation is Love-like. Real lover only de-escalates. Escalation as the PS. Christ-impulse. Last war instinct as the mis-causality and mis-unfolding of fractal solution. The solution is not time-wise, but it is local-space-wise. Last-War instict is related to distancing, not ending as putting an absolute timely end. Atraction and repulsion comes in heterogeneity. Former continues the presence of attracted in Here. Latter discontinues the presence from Here. Real instinct is light, non-projective, and imprints the warlike on sand, is of the "bygones" and elegant.

item.title: Peristalsis in general.
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded: Peristalsis in physical body. Peristalsis in psychical body. Relation of two toroidality is in timelines or spatiality. Spin of torus, and various references of spin. Ray Peat's anti-endotoxicity. Terrain Theory and Germ Theory, Bechamp and Pasteur. Resemblence of internal-toroidality to external-toroidality. Schizoid problems can be derived from the implosiveness or explosiveness of such a resemblence function. Meaning of isolation and spoilage, clostridium. And meaning of claustrum, chrysm.

item.title: Does an emanation in crux decrease the whole? Ana-strophe, and catastrophe. Akashic.
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded:
Relate it to global serotonergical processes, and the sequentialities between event contexts, between spatio-temporalities, between God-occurences. Anamnetic de-residualizations, and residualities as the chronological Sema, exactly hinting the route of re-incarnation sequences. Relation of separate memories of different Lifes. Global serotonergical signal, always renews, but in its giving state, it acts as if Godhead is decreased, so that the entropical trickster Sema can be seen and answered regeneratively, new Life starts, global serotonergy re-news.

The whole has an etherical fabric, as the most primary "context." The infinite takes place in the ether, as electrics and sematics as its potentialization and actualization processes. It takes place and takes time: Ether as spatiotemporal realm. Event is contains what is in it, four elements emerge in sequence as the structure: Plasma, pneuma, liquid, solid. Sense, question, induction, deduction. Life is, at the threshold between the whole-the infinite, and the finite (structure), in the etherical interface. Both matter and soul dies far away from the infinite, it is the last point as finitude. Sedimentation, coagulation, externalization, objectification. The most differentiated part of the whole, away from the whole, to the point that if the parts are summed, the whole cannot be re-attained. Events dies as objects. Regeneration dies as degeneration. Even so, degeneration can show the way for a possible future regeneration. Decay is not extremely distinct from Growth, rather, it is in Growth, but not a Growth.

Neg-entropy, which is the name started to use at the beginnings of cybernetical science. In contrast to entropical processes which all mainstream termodynamical science studies as a basic principle. Here, the opposite attitude will be taken.

Most basic tension in universe:

What takes place in the main context as the neg-entropic zero-point energical processes as a whole are broad and over and more powerful than the entropical fragmentary forcing processes, in two senses: (1) Negentropy is prior in existence, by causally, logically, spatiotemporally coming first. (2) The entropy, if no priority can be found, can show a special type of Sema, which acts as "a tension in ether," to show the new way for regeneration. That is, the priority is not linear but circular, Neg-Entropy, can feed from the Entropical forces, either by burning away the residue, or by feeding from it. Ouroborics of regeneration shows that fire is prior to its ashes, and the ashes can fuel the new fire. The ashes are what is homogenized after Event takes place, as the absolute zero, but as what is most distant to zero-point energy.

That is to say, even Growth itself can grow. Total energy in the universe is not unchanging, let alone Decaying. (Hence Termodynamical laws must be re-ordered beyond its degenerative form.)

Presently existing universe can be transmuted, total energy can always increased, within the infinity. This is the ultimate God-making process, radical transmutation of given universe. And the Decay, or de-generation, always given in a fork: (1) A particulay decay as in Decay. (2) A particular decay as in Growth. (1) As if all local is Decaying or nothing is changing. (2) or as if a residual trickster sign for a new re-generation to occur. New energy sometimes being distant to its residue (Anabolism is always chosen by the etherically inclined) sometimes re-calibrating, or cleaning, or burning its residue (Catabolic pathways are re-regulated). And this is the ultimate war encapsulated by Love. And when the exact burning relation itself oxidized into a higher state, system will residue into another Decay state to be Grown over. Hence Decay shows itself as non-Growth, but it can be used up and erased by new-Growth.

Neg-entropy as more powerful than Entropy.

And the basic daimonics or ethics as:

Do you part on the side of Neg-Entropy, always re-charging and not wasting any energy? Or, Do you part on the side of entropy, striving to sediment the most decayed form of Decay?

Ultimately opposing and burning the decaying attitude of Decay: "If more energy comes Here, it must be taken from somewhere. Life in this place is always a death in another place." To such an attitude, one may step beyond: In actuality, the presupposition of a closed system itself is a sedimentation of previous energical process, even if true and can be shown in a discretized system. That is, attitude itself is Dead and discharging the neg-entropic one by dis-embedding a discontinuity from its continuity. So, one have to look at formative process at the exact Presence, reverting the disembedding act into Here and Now. And in a global look, can infinitude itself diminish in some way in any particular increasings of it? Even if in particular decayings it does not decay it the most global sense. Energizing of the locality is the sublimating process of Here and hence a God-making. Every anabolism may have a catabolic counterpart coming in time-wise later, or place-wise non-zero vacuum (one can trace, for instance, the new energy coming from our sun from its filaments, is a discharging of some other zero-point in some other interstellar system); but this does not a equilibrium process of the infinite, but only a residual finitude. Within the scope of infinite, energy is given to the Sun so that it transmute it so that to increase the net-energy in its presence: Anastrophe. This is the opposite of Wastage. Waste still can occur in the process if some embedding goes wrong, named as Catastophe (Poleshift in star-wise, planet-wise, and organism-wise, is always of wastage. Velikovsky's corpus is a study of this in macro terms. Psychiatry as an organism-wise poleshift, is not studied enough, other than Peat's negative attitude towards excitation, or Wilson's admitting Life as a Down phenomena). And exactly the waste itself, not-being-able-to-actualize-the-anticipated-actualization, or falling-short-of, or "potential and actual becoming far away from themselves=unable to touch," is of the Entropical processes and not the other way around. Please look at your own Life in the light of such tension between anastrophic neg-entropical embedding/power and catastrophic entropical forces. Between Fecundity and Wastage.

Will to barrenness and to wastage is of the Decay attitude. Will to Fecundity is not wasteful (to assume otherwise is entropic; treating the neg-entropy as if it is the invading of another point's energy), rather, it contains the energy ultimately and literally. It contains the polarity of centripetaly and centrifugality, and embedding of continuous energy, in order to be sensitive and to be thoughful to new breath and new question of the moment---in contrast to discontinuing and discretizing into its vectoral components, decomposing itself. Will to Cecundity, contains the new energization, it does not like "to be bled," or "to be disembedded" by a aldready-known forcings hence being a product of old and barren energical residue formations. It knows that blood (metaphorical and literal, as etherical life force (dodecahedron and icosahedron is duals), as the continuous embedding, and becomes dis-embedded if coagulated) is an etherical currency (currency in its most vivid and context-dependent sense, along with its time and place) and must be saved for the best. It desires for higher energy and curious for unknown forcings, hence, taking its time and place, saves and uses the energy for the new Sema, exactly for the next sublimatory processes, and hence the new energizations unknown in the present. With internal control and internal auto-motivity.

This God-making motion has infinite pathways, God is made in infinite localities, in the infinite main contexts of the whole. Because between what is infinite and what is finite, the occuring energy transition is not of a closed system. Even between two finitized systems, there may be an openness, since for what one had the necessity to seperate and interface them other than an interface of them with the infinite? Universe is an open God-making process(es), in its infinite moments. Hence, de Chardin's Omega Point as the end of residual processes as the new regeneration, always coming with an etherical rememberence and purging of a blocking residual memory. System, if open, always backtraces into its etherical re-formative states. The energy coming is both transmuted to radiant peripheral energy, and ultimately to a beamlike upward energy, which is ultimately studied in ancient east as Kundalini, and in Christianity as Chrism, and in various spiritual or scientific epochs in various names.

Death (ultimate Decay) as an impossiblity in two steps, where the latter open is more powerful than the former closed: (1) Energy is not lost, if unchanging, goes somewhere, but (2) it is ever-growing, it is always increased, with a view to and in the perspective of next neg-entropical moment. And perspectivality is always of neg-entropic, infinite zero-points having ana-strophic transmutative relation and sequence between them: Meaning of akashic records with a view to bio-energetics. (And the catastrophic relation and sequence must also held in ethericity as a shadow of it. As a reference to the mis-toroidality entry, this alone can have the power to explain inter-relational traumas.) This is how theosophists like Steiner or some other mediums/clairvoyants can ascertain two past lifes as a continuation of one another. They can feel and study re-incarnative routes. Or with a view to Peat's ideas, consciousness as a standing wave within neutrino sea (other name for neg-entropical zero-point within ether), can be watched from another zero-point; life as a continuation of other, with different count and persistances of physical bodies (tetrahedral to hexahedral structures and their residues).

From there, one can speculate: Serotonin (via Peat's definition) always mediate coagulation in the presence of dis-embedding, bleeding of charge, irritation, hence a micro-Death. If somewhere in the body is inflamed, you feel that particular place. You de-exist into bleeding and coagulation, de-exist elementally in the sequnce of etherical->liquid->solid. This is the negative Pathos. It can occur both physically and psychically, both are regulated by HPA axis in endocrine system. Such state, psychologically sediments also, fall the mind into a prey of entropical thinking: This makes the mind hold unto one entry point to its memory, it rigidifies the memory, un-anamnetically, as a residue memory: i.e. memory as exactly what blocks the backtracing movement. So it an hold only its own decomposition, and the cause of it as the anticipated chain of events, triggerred externally and hence an illusory cause. It is the memory of fear and loss, and of closure. For instance, one cannot forget a quite damaging event in the past, always re-enacting it projecting it into the future. (Relate it to Winnicott's fear of breakdown. Or relate it to Alchemical nigredo, or putrefactio.) And invokes unability to forget the initiator of Decay. Serotonin regulates the blocking memories, absolute imprintings. As if a memory destroys the possiblity of new memories.

However, in contrast, local pain invokes the global pain. And the scenario as entropical as it is, it can give the possiblity of the fork as a particular decay and more broad Growth. The latter is "present" as the absent in the serotonergical memory. It must invoke one to read between the lines; lines being serotonergical blocking-memories in the memory. Global pain works as a fork Sema, signalling next life. Possibility of next neg-entropy. When new energy comes and memory de-residualizes, one can transmute its Decay signal into its next form, and change the psychical content of serotonergy in its next coming. This is a recipe for re-incarnating, both in this Life and in other Lifes. Such a re-newing can have its concentric identities throughout one life, and this is no other than a spiritual concept of soul making a contract before coming into its current incarnation. Whole spiritual tradition have its electrical and sematical science in the tension between neg-entropy and entropy, and here, the exact dynamics of it must be studied, both with a view to electromagnetics and bioenergetics of the situation, and the signalling relations of it.

Peat's brilliance is to be able to sense the interrelations between local biological meaning of serotonin and more global political and physical-philosophical sense of serotonin as a Decay-signal. Here, we must take one step more, and say that, any Decay-signal also signals unknown Growth. This is not to say that one must delve into every particular serotonin cascade. Not at all. Serotonin cascades and chronical serotonin syndromes are the cancer of society, both metaphorically and literally. And one must fly away from cancer of mind and of body as much as possible. Rather, with periodical and heterogeneous anti-serotonergic interventions, one can see serotonin as a global Decay-signal, that is, one does not take it as a closing and localizing, but calls its bluff, seeing the fork as both closing Decay and in Growth in an anastrophical sense. "No pain no gain" attitude is uncalibrated serotonergically, it loses its anastrophic meaning and insight, falling into barren masochism of progress without direction. Rather, one must limit the serotonin cascade, almost eliminate it, but still must be able to smell where the cascade points at. This is the trickster tension between Growth and Decay. This broadens the possibility for new transmutation, by studying the exact "stasiology" at the crux point of experience. Negentropy can either burn up the pointed direction if deciding the meaninglessness of it in its embedding insight by leaving the ashes at nothingness, or can be fed up by the ashes by digesting its degeneration. Ouroborical principle here, either backtracing without digesting or with digesting. (This is the radical interdependence between energy and structure, energy being more prior but feeding.) In all cases, memory retrieved into its non-blocking akashical state: memory as a etherical-tension chain for God-making processes, between the previous lesser-God and next higher-God. This memory is externalized and sedimented as mythology, in the human history. But may possibly have various disguises in both our history and in other life-form's histories.

item.title: (Un)reality inside Words: Relation of Simulation and Serotonin.
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded:
Algorithm's relation to spiral movement. Linear cascading and triggering of loops or state machines in human world, or in cave. Started with false self triggerings, triggerings as univalences, or as not being able to receive the double bind in the fluid intelligence which works in differentiality-degrees. Serotonin as the main rigidifier of body and mind. Thought processes becomes externally controlled and algorithmic and space-time-serotomemory triggered, instead of concentric, embedded and spiralic.

In order for any programming occur, liquid motion as the starter of program and solidity must be interfaced. This is the start. And the framing and exact programming, only occurs with key-lock relations of solid-rigid bodies. This is the principle of mechanism. Programming is solid, hence, of serotonergic. All types of programming from neuro-linguistic to punched-card to a implemented turing machine, works in such way. The dents or holes or half-conducting routes which electrical current flows and cut off through analog-digital filters works by the way of solid imprintings and triggered-machines. Exactly, where you put your dents as solid-memory, stays the same for the next fetching: this is spatial; and the periodical checkings, readings, or dentings, writings, are discretely accessing memory: this is temporal. Spatial and temporal solidity is a necessary condition.


Linearity as a "perfect" circular motion but started from outside, circle having its center from without. Views of halting problem in everyday strifings of animal loops: "tail chasing," behaviour in all animals, most intricate in human narrow-non-intelligence. rigid intelligence narrowed so that no broad loop can be seen.

Anti-serotonin interventions as having a simulation breaking power.

Hypnosis breaking as a perspective shift of circle centered outside: unfolded as "?", revealing the toroidal structure of simulative spherics. But, hypnosis breaking is not un-folding or dis-embedding of insighted everyday motion: Traditional "Socratics" may not be a real hypnosis-breaking.

Re-hypnotizing as calibrated and as uncalibrated. Former is of liquid-crystalline ego, not inflating, only doing in a blisfull way, what it supposed to do in a given ethical moment, daimonically intervened and re-programmed constantly. Uncalibrated hypnosis is prone to its trickter hypnotizations, stays in a never-ending fueling-oxidizing relation, or in a city, minor-depression and hypo-mania inducing relations.

item.title: Serotonin as a possible etheric time-stamp proto-object signifying local solidity context.
item.dc:creator: electricsemiotic
item.content:encoded:
marking the causal bottleneck, creating a local simulative environment.

How what is etheric, can veil the etheric?

Local:

all objects casually connected to a proto-object, this creates its beginning and end and its ordinary time-span. Without proto-object, no object can be in time and space. -- similarly, all candidates of real knowledge implies either an opinion or natural law: both are local. Serotonin or the equivalent of serotonin in pre-biological realm, as any kind of Thanatic signal, or say Entropic signal, may cause the local opinionation or lawfulness to clockwork, until the new deus ex "machina" intervenes and changes the law, miracle. exception is pre-serotonergic, from the space-time-stamp, given-lawfulness is created.

Global:
the spatio-temporality of toroidality, and non-spatio-temporality of god-head, non-emanated infinite.

Candidates for a global serotonergy, or akashic records:

say :
(e) : total existing neg-entropy and its filamentality is emanated god
(s) : the source of the total neg-entropy, infinitude beyond existing infinitude
(t) : this toroidality or this neg-entropy, zero-point which is Here and Now.

1. Relation of (t) to (e).
2. of (t) to (s)
3. of (e) to (s)
4.1 of non-biological (t) (gnosis or knowledge, which can grow on toroidalities in different time and spcae) to (e), 4.2. or non-biological (t) to (s)
5. of this given (t) to non-given but with same center-point of zero-point (t)
6. of non-biological (t) to (t) : sometimes serotonin dosage signifies and pinpoints one's particular knowledge production and its objects.
7. of this (t) to that (t), different center points, within the same smooth space-time continuity: tensive
8. of two (t)'s having different center points within different discontinuous space-time: past/future lifes


(3) becomes the relation between a completed god to the god. This is a teleological end-point of a incarnative route to the infinitude of incarnative god-routes.
(2) is what separated with biological born

It is important to differentiate, toroiddality seperating itself from filamentality and grows, is not solidification from infinite universe. And it is not the death of total energy: for this would be fall in to a hoax of entropic thinking. if torus growing here grows, it is primarily because of the source of all neg-entropy, and not because energy is coming from elsewhere, and when it is stopped, the growth will end. Life Here is not a local death of infinitude, rather, it is a further Life, an increment of infinitude, since it has not upper end limit in degree and in intensity.

But how then, seperation of toroidality from infinite in any above sense admit serotonergy? It is important to differentiate between locality and solidification, or locality and entropy. But see this: An Entropy is from toroidality is not from the source of neg-entropy. Source of neg-entropy causes neg-entropy, this is of the phases of reality. That is local ridigity as absolute is emanated from local as local. Local as local is emanated from what is cannot be globalized. If Entropical De-Context is the sedimentation of primary locality as toroidality, then it must be of the same motion in actuality. Then the rigidification motion is to be understood primarily etherical. But as a peculiarity of ether as the self-veiling of itself. Serotonin is this.

Some signs veils their source, an uncalibrating-sign.

Science of akasha must re-calibrate any uncalibrating-thanatic-entropic-sign. Time-stamping power of torus, platonic solids, vibrational relations must be studied. Serotonin both time-stamps then rigidifies, time-stamp itself becomes veiled and admitting absolutism hence veiling of timeless-ness as given eternality. (this is the same for that assuming the sameness admitted in digital cubism (last entropical deadline of reality) as if it is what is beyond change: most ridiculous form of idolatry which most of philosophy falls into probably because most of the philosophical practice itself is uncalibratingly serotonerging and lipid peroxidative hence anti-pneumatic with rare exceptions.)

This must also show a seditive science's acts of separation regarding knowledge and information. For insance, how physics seperated from psychology, or regarding

-
Etherical timestamping Sema must be bi-valued, at broader level it is bounded to a neg-entropical zero point, at narrower level, it shows the direction for an entropical de-context.

~
upper paragraphes must be anti-serotonergically re-calibrated. too complex, too much distinctions.
